Great Hall<\name> Suits of armor line the walls of the Great Hall.<\description> 1<\minLevel> 10<\maxLevel> 1<\minMonsters> 5<\maxMonsters> <\room>
Torture Room<\name> The room srinks of death. There is a stretching rack in one corner and feightening metal tools hanging from the walls.<\description> 1<\minLevel> 10<\maxLevel> 1<\minMonsters> 4<\maxMonsters> <\room> <\rooms>
